meanings.definition: A restaurant or stall selling crepes.
meanings.sent1: We decided to have lunch at the creperie down the street.
meanings.sent2: The creperie was bustling with customers eager to try the delicious crepes.
meanings.sent3: The creperie had a sign that read, 'All you can eat crepes - challenge accepted!'
meanings.sent4: The aroma of sweet crepes filled the creperie, enticing passersby to come in.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the creperie felt like stepping into a world of endless crepe possibilities.

meanings.definition: A place where crepes are made and sold.
meanings.sent1: The creperie's chef skillfully flipped the crepes on the hot griddle.
meanings.sent2: Customers could watch the crepes being made fresh at the creperie's open kitchen.
meanings.sent3: At the creperie, the crepes were so good that people joked about them being addictive.
meanings.sent4: The creperie hummed with the sound of crepe batter sizzling on the griddle.
meanings.sent5: The creperie's window display showcased a colorful array of freshly made crepes.
